name: Cardwork Cycle
description:
In Cardwork Cycle, you play as a novice farmer who must master the art of farming... which in this world, is based on a deck-building system of cards.

Will you manage to grow the plant that has eluded so many farmers before you?

Additional Notes

Press P to pause, which is more convenient than Escape for the web version.

It is recommended to use the tutorial the first time you play. Hard mode is untested.
